name: Luncheon Fountain
address: 331 E Gun Hill Rd, Bronx, NY 10467, USA

reviews.text: I'll forever love it here, used to come as a kid, and I still go now. I always get their yummy grilled cheese. Even when I walk in now, John remembers my order hehe!
Great local spot for a morning BEC or whatever you are in the mood for!
Muy buen citio , me encantan los sandwich y muy buen servicio al cliente
This was my second time going. The juice taste nasty ü§Æ and today the ketchup was spoiled my friend had coffee and the sugar container had mold and rusty. This people have to do a major cleanup.
So disappointed! Ordered a BLT n found a hair in my sandwich! So disgusting! Will not be coming back here ever again!!!!!
My second   in this business n I love to see the mix culture.   The Jamaican food is slamming
As a kid I always used to come here for there good butter rolls and they owners always liked me
